briefdescription.para: position of the block in the grid of cells;
number of the connector that is along the x axis.
Get the interface from the neighbor position in the grid.

parameterdescription.para: position of the cell (if in the grid)

simplesect.para: return interface if it exists one connected, NULL otherwise

briefdescription.para: Get the position of the gridcell in the direction of the given connector.

parameterdescription.para: position of the cell (if in the grid)

simplesect.para: return true if the cell is in the grid, false otherwise.
